song.eTitle: I WILL EXTOL THE LORD -- Psalm 34, NIV

verses.verse: This poor man called, and the Lord heard him; he saved him out of all his troubles The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, And he delivers them.
Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in him. Fear the Lord, you his saints, for those who fear him lack nothing.
The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; He delivers them from all their troubles. The Lord is close to the broken hearted And saves those who are crushed in spirit.
